title: Best of The Herd for Feb 04, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Feb 04, 2020
description:
Colin understands why the Cowboys aren't willing to pay Dak what he wants and thinks there is only two QBs in the NFL worth that kind of money. He thinks people that are down on the 49ers right now are crazy and explains why. He makes his first big NFL draft prediction and it involves a relatively unknown prospect going top ten. Plus, Peter King of NBC Sports talks about his sit down with Andy Reid after the Super Bowl and why he only blames Kyle Shanahan for one thing.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
